attributes.action: CAP THE PRICE OF DIESEL AND PETROL AT £1 PER LITRE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price of petrol and diesel needs to be capped at £1 per litre to combat inflation and the cost of food and other goods essential goods & services in the market. This can be achieved by controlling & severely punishing profiteering in the oil markets as well as reducing the level of duty raised on petroleum products & any excessive profits being made by the oil and distribution companies. If petrol in the USA costs no more than £1.40 per gallon there is no excuse for it to over £4 a gallon in the UK. Action now please.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
